title: Is We Dumb? | Pubis Mound. Baby Muffins. Secret Note. Macaroni.
description:
Listen... if you're visiting Yellowstone National Park and then going online to submit a one-star review because there's "too many elk"... you need to have your internet privileges taken away permanently. Let's talk about that, accidentally blasting porn for the entire neighborhood, frivolous lawsuits, the stupid technological trend of having smart everythings, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

The number one thing you can do to help us out the gate is to rate, review, and subscribe to Is We Dumb? wherever you listen to podcasts! We truly appreciate your support.


New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST


Show Links:

Gardening on Salvia | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EVllL4tNZsI

Blockbuster Airbnb | https://cnn.it/3hsFlkT

Tesla Goat Horn | https://bit.ly/2Qqub3Y


Suggestions for segment content: dumb@iswedumb.com

Anything else: info@iswedumb.com


Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/-ZMSCApD_AA


Merch: http://badmagicmerch.com

IG: https://instagram.com/iswedumb

FB: https://facebook.com/iswedumb

BadMagic YouTube: http://youtube.com/badmagicproductions


Official Website: http://iswedumb.com
